translations.text: Behold, We revealed this (Qur'an) on the Night of Power.<sup foot_note="182792">1</sup>
And what do you know what the Night of Power is?
The Night of Power is better than a thousand months.<sup foot_note="182793">1</sup>
The angels along with the Spirit<sup foot_note="182794">1</sup> descend in it by the permission of their Lord<sup foot_note="182795">2</sup> with all kinds of decrees.
All peace is that night until the rise of dawn.<sup foot_note="182796">1</sup>
